name: Cactus Game (6Asterisks)
description:
Gamepad is required

A button - Jump/Accept

Release B button - Display hit boxes

Left Stick - Move Around

Right Stick - Move Camera

This was a quick thing I threw together while developing my game engine in c++.

The controls are pretty bad. But if you can get all the cactus you get a secret prize.

OpenGL 330 required

Also I think I used some OpenGL API calls that won't work with graphics from intel chips.

If any crashes happen. Please let me know in the comments and your CPU/GPU setup.

Thank you :)

Music in the game is from YouFulca

https://wingless-seraph.net/en/index.html
